definition: to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Yuchang Zou has been engaged in cosmetic surgery for 19 years after his clinical graduation.

sentences.english: Are there any beauty parlours in the hotel?
Manicure counters are a familiar sight in Singapore's ubiquitous shopping malls, which also boast at least one beauty salon each.
sentences.chinese: 美甲店和美容院在新加坡的各大商場中隨處可以看見。

definition: to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
health protection/health care/to maintain in good health
hairdressing/to give sb's hair a cut or other beauty treatment/beautiful hair
non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
to win honor/to put on a stern face/to have a facial (beauty treatment)
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
